Key Match Events: Immanuel Quickley scored 12 points in the fourth quarter
Bruno Fernando provided energy and impactful stats
Norman Powell led all scorers with 24 points
Post-Match Reflections: The Raptors dropped their third straight loss
The team is winless on the road (0-5)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Coach Darko Rajakovic made a questionable decision down the stretch
The Clippers' foul-bait duo Norman Powell and James Harden combined for 22 free throws
Others: The Raptors' perimeter shooting was cold at times
The Clippers threatened to pull away several times
Jakob Poeltl could not provide the same impact as usual
